titleStmt.title: The description of the Low countreys and of the prouinces thereof, gathered into an epitome out of the historie of Lodouico Guicchardini
Descrittione di tutti i Paesi Bassi. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Guicciardini, Lodovico, 1521-1589.
Danett, Thomas, fl. 1566-1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short for Thomas Chard,

notesStmt.note: A translation and abridgment by Thomas Danett, who signs the dedication, of "Descrittione di tutti i Paesi Bassi".
First word of title is xylographic.
A1 is cancelled; [par.]6 is signed "A" and unfoliated. Variant: [par.]6 is cancelled; A1 bears the same text in a different setting and is foliated 1.
Running title reads: The description of the Low countreys.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
